attributes.action: Give British families a windfall of £40,000 to pay off debt or invest to help relieve economic crisis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I heard a fantastic idea on the radio this morning:

Rather than pay tax-payers' money directly to financial institutions, allow the tax payer to directly feel the benefit whilst putting money into the economy.  Families who owe money can use it to pay off debt, balances to be invested in the British economy for a minimum period.
